text: The Golden Rule of Parenting is do unto your children as you wish your parents had done unto you!
author: Louise Hart

text: I would like to do another piece of fiction dealing with a number of issues: Lesbian parenting, the 1960's, and interracial relationships in the Lesbian and Gay community.
author: Audre Lorde

text: Parenting is the most important job on the planet next to keeping Gary Busey off the nation's highways.
author: Dennis Miller

text: Indeed - judicious, consistent parenting is a dream of mine. No judgements, learning space and listening carefully are my goals.
author: Emma Thompson

text: I thought that once we were out of the baby stage, parenting would be a breeze.
author: Tori Spelling
